Package DBHandler

Class DBController

java.lang.Object
DBHandler.DBController
public class DBController extends Object
DBController class used to connect to a mysql DB and perform actions related to the DB.

  • Constructor Details

    • DBController

      public DBController() throws Exception
      Constructor for the DBController class. It tries to connect to existed mysql DB, when it is not established it creates it with buildDB method
      Throws:
      Exception - when connection failed

  • Method Details

    • buildDB

      private void buildDB()
      buildDB method used to build a connection to mysql DB with sql script 'DB.sql'
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - when connection failed

    • isConnected

      public static boolean isConnected()
      Checks if mysql connection exist
      Returns:
      boolean : if connection exist returns true, else returns false

    • setDB_prop

      public static void setDB_prop(String ip, String dbName, String user, String password)
      Sets the properties for connecting to mysql DB
      Parameters:
      ip - IP address of mysql server.
      dbName - mysql connection name.
      user - mysql username.
      password - mysql password.

    • connection

      public static Connection connection() throws Exception
      Returns a connection to the mysql DB. If connection is not exist it call DBController constructor to create a connection.
      Returns:
      Connection of mysql DB.
      Throws:
      Exception - if new connection creation failed

    • dropConnection

      public static void dropConnection()
      Sets the current connection to null for closing mysql DB connection.

    • getQuant

      public static int getQuant(int id)
      Perform Select from DB and returns quantity of a product.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of a product.
      Returns:
      The quantity of the product or -1 if an error occurs.

    • select

      public static ResultSet select(String query)
      Perform Select from DB and returns Result Set.
      Parameters:
      query - The Select statement to be executed.
      Returns:
      results that returned from the SELECT statement, or null if an error occurs.

    • update

      public static Integer update(String query)
      Perform Update to DB and number of rows affected.
      Parameters:
      query - The Update statement to be executed.
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected.

    • importUsers

      public static boolean importUsers()
      Utility import method. Imports users and customers data from users.txt and customer.txt files to the DB by executing Update queries.
      Returns:
      return true of import successed, else return false;
